phrs.translation: 在床上, 阿贝德, 阿拜德, 巴西远程教育协会
睡懒觉的人, 的中文释义
拉波, 亚西尔·阿比德·拉布, 会秘书长拉布, 巴勒斯坦高级官员拉波

sentences.sentence: How could I have stayed abed!
Abed left his comfortable life and returned to a remote area of northeastern Bangladesh.
sentences.translation: 他放弃了自己舒适的生活，返回偏远的孟加拉东北地区。

sentences.sentence: "Turning each page is like making abed, an enormous expanse of paper slowly rises up and over."
sentences.translation: “每翻一页都像在铺床一样，一张巨大的纸翻起来又落下。”
